title: UK Government Backs Orbex with £20M Investment
summary:
The UK Government has announced a £20 million (€23,8 million) investment in Orbex to support the construction and launch of its first Prime rocket from SaxaVord Spaceport in Scotland later this year. Prime is a small two-stage rocket designed to be capable of delivering payloads of up to 180 kilograms into low Earth orbit. In […]
